a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Change of GDP per capita over the last generation in countries
with a high share in extreme poverty, 1990 to 2021
GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and for price differences between countries, it is measured in constant international-$.
Data source: Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
